guardian.title: Video of fatal Washington shooting throws doubt on police account
guardian.topComment: Absolutely disgusting. If that cop doesn't get charged and convicted with murder there should be riots.

guardian.title: US faces worst droughts in 1,000 years, predict scientists
guardian.topComment: It's ironic. While we are busy fouling all of our fresh water sources with tar oil and benzene, we find out that we will be having massive water shortages.

guardian.title: NWA, bangers and beef – the moments that made a megastar
guardian.topComment: I'm surprised the Guardian are lauding a man who assaulted a woman (even if not for the act itself). What are the rules? I really don't get it.

guardian.title: US cautiously optimistic amid ‘escalation of fighting’
guardian.topComment: As long as Poroshenko insists Ukraine be unitary rather than federalized - aka he wants his western area to be able to do a "tyranny of the majority" on the eastern area - Ukraine is unlikely to be at peace. He has yet to explain why he's so wedded t...

guardian.title: Shot by police, then isolated in hospital. Why was Kevin Davis's family barred from seeing him?
guardian.topComment: Disgraceful in the extreme, and in every possible way. I hope heaps of repercussions follow for DeKalb law enforcement.
